languages.text: "Он — божественный механизм, творец технологии. Вселенная сотворена механистичной, потому Омниссия властвует над ней. Знание — высшая форма, в которой он проявляется в мире... пока что. Однажды он воплотится в мире в абсолютной полноте своего величия".

traits.locale_text: "Он — божественный механизм, творец технологии. Вселенная сотворена механистичной, потому Омниссия властвует над ней. Знание — высшая форма, в которой он проявляется в мире... пока что. Однажды он воплотится в мире в абсолютной полоте своего величия".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "He is the divine mechanism, the maker of technology. The universe was made to resemble a mechanical marvel because the Omnissiah rules over it. Knowledge is the highest form that He uses to manifest in the world... for now. Someday He will come to this world in the absolute fullness of His splendour."
languages.original_text: "Он — божественный механизм, творец технологии. Вселенная сотворена механистичной, потому Омниссия властвует над ней. Знание — высшая форма, в которой он проявляется в мире... пока что. Однажды он воплотится в мире в абсолютной полноте своего величия".

traits.locale_text: "He is the divine mechanism, the maker of technology. The universe was made to resemble a mechanical marvel because Omnissiah rules over it. Knowledge is the highest form that he uses to manifest in the world... for now. Some day he will come to this world in the absolute fullness of his splendor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

Knowledge is the highest form that he uses to manifest in the world... for now. Some day he will come to this world in the absolute fullness of his splendor."

Knowledge is the highest form that He uses to manifest in the world... for now. Someday He will come to this world in the absolute fullness of his splendor."

traits.locale_text: "He is the divine mechanism, the maker of technology. The universe was made to resemble a mechanical marvel because the Omnissiah rules over it. Knowledge is the highest form that He uses to manifest in the world... for now. Someday He will come to this world in the absolute fullness of His splendour."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “祂是神圣的机械，是一切技术的制造者。宇宙本身之所以如同机械的奇迹造物一般，正是因为它的统治者是欧姆尼塞亚。知识是祂在这个世界化身的最崇高的形式……目前如此。终有一天，祂将散发出祂全部的光辉，降临到这个世界。”
languages.original_text: "He is the divine mechanism, the maker of technology. The universe was made to resemble a mechanical marvel because the Omnissiah rules over it. Knowledge is the highest form that He uses to manifest in the world... for now. Someday He will come to this world in the absolute fullness of His splendour."

traits.locale_text: “祂是神圣的机械，是一切技术的制造者。宇宙本身之所以如同机械的奇迹造物一般，正是因为它的统治者是欧姆尼塞亚。知识是祂在这个世界化身的最崇高的形式……目前如此。终有一天，祂将散发出祂全部的光辉，降临到这个世界。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Es el mecanismo divino, creador de la tecnología. El universo fue creado a imagen y semejanza de una maravilla mecánica porque es el Omnissiah quien lo gobierna. El conocimiento es la forma suprema en la que se manifiesta en este mundo... por ahora. Algún día acudirá a este mundo en todo su esplendor».
languages.original_text: "He is the divine mechanism, the maker of technology. The universe was made to resemble a mechanical marvel because the Omnissiah rules over it. Knowledge is the highest form that He uses to manifest in the world... for now. Someday He will come to this world in the absolute fullness of His splendour."

traits.locale_text: «Es el mecanismo divino, creador de la tecnología. El universo fue creado a imagen y semejanza de una maravilla mecánica porque es el Omnissiah quien lo gobierna. El conocimiento es la forma suprema en la que se manifiesta en este mundo... por ahora. Algún día acudirá a este mundo en todo su esplendor».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「主は神聖なるメカニズムであり、テクノロジーの創造者である。宇宙が機械仕掛けの驚異に似ているのは、万機神が宇宙を支配しているからだ。知識は、主がこの世に顕現するために用いる最高の形態である…今のところは。いつの日か、主は絶対的な輝きをもってこの世に現れるだろう」
languages.original_text: "He is the divine mechanism, the maker of technology. The universe was made to resemble a mechanical marvel because the Omnissiah rules over it. Knowledge is the highest form that He uses to manifest in the world... for now. Someday He will come to this world in the absolute fullness of His splendour."

traits.locale_text: 「主は神聖なるメカニズムであり、テクノロジーの創造者である。宇宙が機械仕掛けの驚異に似ているのは、万機神が宇宙を支配しているからだ。知識は、主がこの世に顕現するために用いる最高の形態である…今のところは。いつの日か、主は絶対的な輝きをもってこの世に現れるだろう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Er ist der göttliche Mechanismus, der Schöpfer der Technologie. Das Universum wurde als Abbild eines mechanischen Wunders erschaffen, weil der Omnissiah darüber herrscht. Wissen ist die höchste Form, die er einsetzt, um sich in der Welt zu manifestieren ... vorerst. Eines Tages wird er mit seinem vollen Glanz auf dieser Welt erscheinen."
languages.original_text: "He is the divine mechanism, the maker of technology. The universe was made to resemble a mechanical marvel because the Omnissiah rules over it. Knowledge is the highest form that He uses to manifest in the world... for now. Someday He will come to this world in the absolute fullness of His splendour."

traits.locale_text: "Er ist der göttliche Mechanismus, der Schöpfer der Technologie. Das Universum wurde als Abbild eines mechanischen Wunders erschaffen, weil der Omnissiah darüber herrscht. Wissen ist die höchste Form, die er einsetzt, um sich in der Welt zu manifestieren ... vorerst." Eines Tages wird er mit seinem vollen Glanz auf dieser Welt erscheinen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Il est le divin mécanisme, le créateur de la technologie. Si l'univers a été conçu pour ressembler à une merveille mécanique, c'est parce que l'Omnimessie y règne. La Connaissance est Sa manifestation la plus pure dans notre monde... jusqu'à présent. Un jour, Il apparaîtra face à nous dans toute l'entièreté de Sa splendeur. »
languages.original_text: "He is the divine mechanism, the maker of technology. The universe was made to resemble a mechanical marvel because the Omnissiah rules over it. Knowledge is the highest form that He uses to manifest in the world... for now. Someday He will come to this world in the absolute fullness of His splendour."

traits.locale_text: « Il est le divin mécanisme, le créateur de la technologie. Si l'univers a été conçu pour ressembler à une merveille mécanique, c'est parce que l'Omnimessie y règne. La Connaissance est Sa manifestation la plus pure dans notre monde... jusqu'à présent. Un jour, Il apparaîtra face à nous dans toute l'entièreté de Sa splendeur. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "He is the divine mechanism, the maker of technology. The universe was made to resemble a mechanical marvel because the Omnissiah rules over it. Knowledge is the highest form that He uses to manifest in the world... for now. Someday He will come to this world in the absolute fullness of his splendour."

languages.text: "Kutsal mekanizmadır, teknolojinin yaratıcısıdır. Evrenin mekanik bir mucize suretinde yaratılmış olması, Hermesih ona hükmettiğindendir. O'nun dünyada kendini gösterdiği en yüce biçim İrfandır. Şimdilik. Bir gün mutlak ihtişamıyla bu dünyaya inecektir."
languages.original_text: "He is the divine mechanism, the maker of technology. The universe was made to resemble a mechanical marvel because the Omnissiah rules over it. Knowledge is the highest form that He uses to manifest in the world... for now. Someday He will come to this world in the absolute fullness of His splendour."

traits.locale_text: "O kutsal mekanizmadır, teknolojinin yaratıcısıdır. Evrenin mekanik bir mucize suretinde yaratılmış olması, ona Hermesih hükmettiği içindir. O'nun dünyada kendini gösterdiği en yüce biçim İrfandır. Şimdilik. Bir gün mutlak ihtişamıyla bu dünyaya inecek."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
